message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $20,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. How about $15,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is below my bottom line. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $17,500?
Hi Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, how about $16,000?
Bob, we're getting closer. I can tell you're serious about this product, and I want to make this work. My final offer is $16,750. This is a very competitive price for the value you're getting.
Alice, I really appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose $16,500.
